---
id: set-conversation-marks
title: "SetConvMark"
description: "By calling this API, you can set or cancel marks for multiple conversations for multiple users. Each conversation can have up to 30 marks."
api: 
info_path: core_products/zim/en/docs_zim_server/Conversation/open-api-desc
---

<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>SetConvMark</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"post"} path={"/"}></MethodEndpoint>


By calling this API, you can set or cancel marks for multiple conversations for multiple users. Each conversation can have up to 30 marks.

The client will receive changes in conversation marks through the following ZIM SDK callback:

| iOS-25% | Android-25% | macOS-25% | Windows-25% |
|-----|---------|-------|---------|
| [conversationChanged](https://www.zegocloud.com/docs/api?doc=zim_API~objective-c_ios~protocol~ZIMEventHandler#zim-group-member-info-updated-operated-info-group-id) | [onConversationChanged](https://www.zegocloud.com/docs/api?doc=zim_API~java_android~class~ZIMEventHandler#on-conversation-changed) | [conversationChanged](https://www.zegocloud.com/docs/api?doc=zim_API~objective-c_macos~protocol~ZIMEventHandler#zim-group-member-info-updated-operated-info-group-id) | [onConversationChanged](https://www.zegocloud.com/docs/api?doc=zim_API~cpp_windows~class~ZIMEventHandler#on-conversation-changed) |

| Web-25% | Mini Program-25% | Flutter-25% | React Native-25% |
|-----|--------|---------|--------------|
| [conversationChanged](https://www.zegocloud.com/docs/api?doc=zim_API~javascript_web~interface~ZIMEventHandler#conversation-changed) | [conversationChanged](https://www.zegocloud.com/docs/api?doc=zim_API~javascript_wxxcx~interface~ZIMEventHandler#conversation-changed) | [onConversationChanged](https://pub.dev/documentation/zego_zim/latest/zego_zim/ZIMEventHandler/onConversationChanged.html) | [conversationChanged](https://www.zegocloud.com/docs/api?doc=zim_API~javascript_react-native~interface~ZIMEventHandler#conversation-changed) |

| Unity3D-25% | uni-app \| uni-app x-25% | HarmonyOS-25% |
|---------|---------|---------|
| [OnConversationChanged](https://www.zegocloud.com/docs/api?doc=zim_API~cs_unity3d~class~ZIMEventHandler#on-conversation-changed) |[conversationChanged](https://www.zegocloud.com/docs/api?doc=zim_API~javascript_uni-app~interface~ZIMEventHandler#group-application-updated) | [conversationChanged](https://www.zegocloud.com/docs/api?doc=zim_API~javascript_harmony~interface~ZIMEventHandler#conversation-changed) |  |  |

<Note title="QPS Limit"> 20 times/s</Note>

The key is the conversation ID, and the value is a JSON Object containing only the key MarkContent. The list can contain up to 100 conversations.</div><SchemaItem collapsible={true} className={"schemaItem"}><details style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details"}><summary style={{}}><span className={"openapi-schema__container"}><strong className={"openapi-schema__property"}>property name*</strong><span className={"openapi-schema__name"}> object</span></span></summary><div className={"schema-description-container"}><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"MarkContent"} required={true} schemaName={"number"} qualifierMessage={"**Possible values:** `>= 1` and `<= 30`"} schema={{"type":"number","minimum":1,"maximum":30,"description":"Conversation mark. An integer value in the range [1, 30].","example":2}}></SchemaItem></div></details></SchemaItem></div></details></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={true} className={"schemaItem"}><details style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details"}><summary style={{}}><span className={"openapi-schema__container"}><strong className={"openapi-schema__property"}>SetMarkGroup</strong><span className={"openapi-schema__name"}> object</span></span></summary><div className={"schema-description-container"}><div className={"schema-description"}>At least one of SetMarkC2c and SetMarkGroup must be selected.<br/>Group conversation list (JSON Object). The key is the conversation ID, and the value is a JSON Object containing only the key MarkContent. The list can contain up to 100 conversations (group conversations must already exist and not be deleted).</div><SchemaItem collapsible={true} className={"schemaItem"}><details style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details"}><summary style={{}}><span className={"openapi-schema__container"}><strong className={"openapi-schema__property"}>property name*</strong><span className={"openapi-schema__name"}> object</span></span></summary><div className={"schema-description-container"}><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"MarkContent"} required={true} schemaName={"number"} qualifierMessage={"**Possible values:** `>= 1` and `<= 30`"} schema={{"type":"number","minimum":1,"maximum":30,"description":"Conversation mark. An integer value in the range [1, 30].","example":2}}></SchemaItem></div></details></SchemaItem></div></details></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"Action"} required={true} schemaName={"boolean"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"boolean","description":"Mark operation:\n- true: Set mark.\n- false: Cancel mark.\n","example":true}}></SchemaItem><li className={"closing-array-bracket-container"}><div className={"closing-array-bracket"}>]</div></li></div></details></SchemaItem></ul></details></TabItem></MimeTabs>
<div><div><ApiTabs label={undefined} id={undefined}><TabItem label={"200"} value={"200"}><div>OK</div><div><MimeTabs className={"openapi-tabs__mime"} schemaType={"response"}><TabItem label={"application/json"} value={"application/json"}><SchemaTabs className={"openapi-tabs__schema"}><TabItem label={"Schema"} value={"Schema"}><details style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details response"} data-collapsed={false} open={true}><summary style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-response"}><strong>Schema</strong></summary><ul className={"response-schema-first-body-node-container"}><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"Code"} required={false} schemaName={"number"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"number","description":"Return code.\n\nThe following only lists the return codes related to the API business logic. For the complete return codes, please refer to [Return codes](/zim-server/return-codes).\n> **Note**\n>\n> When you request to set or cancel marks for multiple conversations:\n> <ul><li>As long as the operation is successfully completed for at least one conversation, Code will return 0, indicating success. In this case, please refer to the specific information in FailList to understand the details of failed operations.</li>\n> <li>If the operations for all conversations fail, Code will return the relevant return code. For details, please refer to <a href=\"../return-codes.mdx\">Return codes</a>.</li></ul>\n<table>\n<thead><tr><th>Return code</th><th>Description</th><th>Suggested Solution</th></tr></thead>\n<tbody>\n<tr><td>660000001</td><td>General business error.</td><td>Please retry or contact ZEGOCLOUD Technical Support.</td></tr>\n<tr><td>660000002</td><td>Input parameter error.</td><td>Please check the input parameters.</td></tr>\n<tr><td>660300005</td><td>The API call frequency exceeds the AppID-level limit.</td><td>Please try again later.</td></tr>\n<tr><td>660800001</td><td>Error querying user information.</td><td>Please contact ZEGOCLOUD Technical Support.</td></tr>\n<tr><td>660800054</td><td>Mark operations for all conversations failed.</td><td>Please contact ZEGOCLOUD Technical Support.</td></tr>\n</tbody>\n</table>\n"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"Message"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","description":"Description of the request result.","example":"success"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"RequestId"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","description":"Request ID.","example":"343649807833778782"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={true} className={"schemaItem"}><details style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details"}><summary style={{}}><span className={"openapi-schema__container"}><strong className={"openapi-schema__property"}>FailList</strong><span className={"openapi-schema__name"}> object[]</span></span></summary><div className={"schema-description-container"}><div className={"schema-description"}>List of users for whom conversation mark operations failed.- When Code is 0:  - If FailList is empty, conversation mark operations for all users succeeded.  - If FailList is not empty, it means conversation mark operations for some users failed. Please refer to SubCode and SubMessage in FailList for handling.- When Code is not 0:  - If FailList is empty, it indicates parameter error, API frequency limit, or system error.  - If FailList is not empty, it means conversation mark operations for all users failed.</div><li className={"opening-array-bracket-container"}><div className={"opening-array-bracket"}><span className={"opening-array-bracket_text"}>Array</span><span className={"opening-array-bracket_symbol"}>[</span></div></li><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"SubCode"} required={false} schemaName={"number"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"number","description":"Used to identify the result of executing conversation mark operations for a user.","example":0}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"SubMessage"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","description":"Describes the result of executing conversation mark operations for a user.","example":"succ"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"UserId"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","description":"ID of the target user for the conversation mark operation.","example":"UserA"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={true} className={"schemaItem"}><details style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details"}><summary style={{}}><span className={"openapi-schema__container"}><strong className={"openapi-schema__property"}>FailList</strong><span className={"openapi-schema__name"}> object[]</span></span></summary><div className={"schema-description-container"}><div className={"schema-description"}>List of target conversations for which mark operations failed.- When SubCode is 0:  - If FailList is empty, operations for all target conversations of the target user succeeded.  - If FailList is not empty, it means operations for some target conversations of the target user failed. Please refer to Code and Message in FailList for handling.- When SubCode is not 0:  - If FailList is empty, it indicates parameter error, API frequency limit, or system error.  - If FailList is not empty, it means operations for all target conversations of the target user failed.</div><li className={"opening-array-bracket-container"}><div className={"opening-array-bracket"}><span className={"opening-array-bracket_text"}>Array</span><span className={"opening-array-bracket_symbol"}>[</span></div></li><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"Code"} required={false} schemaName={"number"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"number","description":"Return code for failed operation.","example":1}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"Message"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","description":"Description of failed operation.","example":"mark content is invalide"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"ConvId"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","description":"Conversation ID.\n- One-on-one conversation: Conversation ID is the user ID.\n- Group conversation: Conversation ID is the group ID.\n","example":"conv_id_1"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"ConvType"} required={false} schemaName={"number"} qualifierMessage={"**Possible values:** [`0`, `2`]"} schema={{"type":"number","enum":[0,2],"description":"Conversation type.\n- 0: One-on-one conversation.\n- 2: Group conversation.\n","example":0}}></SchemaItem><li className={"closing-array-bracket-container"}><div className={"closing-array-bracket"}>]</div></li></div></details></SchemaItem><li className={"closing-array-bracket-container"}><div
